description.value: Each time you use your @UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.abilities.Item.S1KR2X2c81VGQqsO]{Healing Grace} ability, you gain 1 piety that can be spent only on that ability during the same turn. If you don’t use this piety, it is lost. Additionally, you can use your @UUID[Compendium.draw-steel.classes.Item.uZeSKxyTMbdyxOBr]{Minor Miracle} feature to return a creature to life even if you don’t have their remains.
